Rakish Audacity: +2 Initiative
Strength Attack Adjustment: +3
Strength Damage Adjustment: +3
Cunning Action: May use a bonus action to Dash, Disengage, or Hide 1/rd
Durable: Regains a minimum of 4 HP from a Hit Die roll
Elusive: Attacks on self never have Adv
Fancy Footwork: Attacked foe cannot make an OA against self for 1 rd
Master Duelist: May reroll a miss with Adv 1/short rest
Master Of Tactics: R30' May use Help as a bonus action
Misdirection: May use Reaction to redirect an attack from self to a creature that provides cover
Rakish Audacity: May use Sneak Attack w/out Adv when target is only adjacent foe (Disadv neg)
Sharpshooter: Suffers no Disadv on attacks at long range/Range attacks ignore 3/4 cover/May suffer -5 attack w/a ranged weapon to gain +10 damage
Sneak Attack: +10d6 damage on attacks w/Adv or shared threat
Stroke Of Luck: May change a miss into a hit or take an automatic 20 on an ability check 1/short rest
Uncanny Dodge: May use Reaction to reduce damage taken from an attack by half
Save Proficiency: Dexterity; Intelligence; Wisdom

Save Notes:
Slippery Mind: Save Proficiency (Wisdom)
Evasion: Successful Dexterity save yields no damage instead of half; failure yields half damage
Soul Of Deceit: Immune to telepathy, may use Deception vs. Insight to present false thoughts, and always detects as telling the truth
